text: mariyu memu ibrahim ku i grham (ka'abah) yokka sthalanni nirdesinci (cuputu) atanito: "Evvarini naku satiga (bhagasvamuluga) kalpincaku, mariyu na grhanni, pradaksina (tavaph) cesevari koraku namaj cesevari koraku, vange (ruku'u) mariyu sastangam (sajda) cesevari koraku, parisud'dhanga uncu" ani annamu
